title: I rode over a bird.What should i do now?
transcript: Su Hal says as I was coming home at night I rode over a bird and Allah knows best whether it was dead before it or it died afterwards it was totally accidental what should I do and the answer is there's nothing for you to do because there is no sin involved as long as it was accidental and you did not intend it then in this case is most forgiving and there's no sin on you
